definitions: Stuffy people or institutions are formal and old-fashioned.
If it is stuffy in a place, it is unpleasantly warm and there is not enough fresh air.
If you have a stuffy nose, your nose is blocked, usually because you have a cold.
(of the nasal passages) blocked with mucus
poorly ventilated; having little fresh air; close
having the nasal passages stopped up, as from a cold
dull or stodgy; not interesting or stimulating
lacking in interest, as writing or discourse
affected with a sensation of obstruction in the respiratory passages
rigid or strait-laced in attitudes, esp. in matters of personal behavior
